name: Discovery: Science
overview: Expansion disk for Discovery an Interactive, Education Space Adventure. Watch for new Discovery Expansion Disks to Increase your Discovery adventure library! LOADING Discovery Expansion Disks: When you are using your Discovery Game Disk which you purchased with either Math 1 or Spelling | Data, you will notice at the menu selector for which category to select, it says "or insert another disk at this time," you just pop in a new Expansion Disk and you're off! Enjoy learning with Discovery! In the lower realms of the Space Ship Discovery, you face the Meba and you need to choose the correct answer to a Science question to prevail! Only your science knowledge can help us prevail.
